input.concept: Sistema de control de acceso con tarjetas RFID y registro de entradas
input.requirements_yaml:
title: Sistema de Control de Acceso y Registro de Entradas con Tarjetas RFID
description: El proyecto propone desarrollar un sistema integral de control de acceso
  a instalaciones mediante tarjetas RFID. El sistema permitirá registrar cada entrada
  y salida de personas autorizadas, generando un historial detallado de movimientos
  dentro de la zona controlada. Además, integrará una interfaz de usuario amigable
  para administradores y usuarios finales, asegurando el seguimiento en tiempo real
  del acceso y alertas automáticas en caso de actividades anómales.
functional_requirements:
- id: FR001
  description: Usuario puede crear y gestionar cuentas de usuarios autorizados con
    tarjetas RFID
  priority: High
- id: FR002
  description: Sistema registra cada entrada y salida de usuarios con tarjeta RFID
  priority: High
- id: FR003
  description: Generación de informes diarios/mensales de movimientos dentro del área
    controlada
  priority: Medium
- id: FR004
  description: Alertas automáticas en caso de múltiples accesos fallidos o actividades
    anómales
  priority: High
- id: FR005
  description: Interfaz web para administradores para ver y gestionar cuentas y registros
  priority: High
non_functional_requirements:
- id: NFR001
  description: Sistema debe ser seguro contra accesos no autorizados
  priority: High
- id: NFR002
  description: Alta disponibilidad del sistema con capacidad de tolerancia a fallos
  priority: Medium
- id: NFR003
  description: Escalabilidad para manejar un aumento en el número de usuarios y registros
  priority: Medium
- id: NFR004
  description: Facilidad de uso para todos los usuarios finales (administradores,
    personal de seguridad)
  priority: High
constraints:
- id: C001
  description: Sistema debe ser compatible con tarjetas RFID existentes en la instalación
  priority: High
- id: C002
  description: Restricciones presupuestarias para adquisición de hardware y software
    adicionales
  priority: Medium
- id: C003
  description: Cumplimiento normativo con leyes locales sobre privacidad y seguridad
    de datos
  priority: High
input.product_vision:
product_name: RFID Access Control System
product_summary: An integrated system designed to manage and monitor access to facilities
  using RFID technology. It ensures secure entry and exit for authorized personnel,
  maintains a detailed log of movements, provides real-time oversight, and alerts
  administrators to anomalous activities, all through a user-friendly web interface.
target_users:
- Facility Administrators
- Security Personnel
- Authorized Employees/Personnel
value_proposition:
- Enhanced security through controlled and monitored access to facilities.
- Comprehensive audit trail and detailed history of personnel movements.
- Real-time visibility into facility access and potential security incidents.
- Streamlined management of authorized users and access permissions.
- Compliance with relevant data privacy and security regulations.
key_capabilities:
- RFID card-based entry and exit validation.
- Management of authorized user accounts and RFID card assignments.
- Automatic logging of all access events (entry/exit).
- Generation of customizable access reports (e.g., daily, monthly).
- Real-time alerts for failed access attempts or unusual access patterns.
- Web-based administrative interface for system management and monitoring.
- Secure and reliable operation with high availability and fault tolerance.
- Scalable architecture to support growing user bases and data volumes.
non_goals:
- Integration with external HR or payroll systems for personnel management.
- Biometric authentication methods (e.g., fingerprint, facial recognition).
- Advanced facility management features beyond access control (e.g., HVAC control).
- Public-facing access control functionalities (e.g., guest registration kiosks).
success_metrics:
- Reduction in unauthorized access incidents.
- Percentage of access events accurately logged and reported.
- Administrator satisfaction with system usability and reporting capabilities.
- Full compliance with local data privacy and security regulations.
- System uptime and reliability metrics.
last_updated: 2023-10-27 10:30:00+00:00

output.architecture_yaml:
backend:
  framework: Python/Flask
  api: REST
  services:
  - User/Card Management
  - Access Log Processing
  - Reporting Engine
frontend:
  framework: React
  interface: Web Admin Panel
  features:
  - User/Card CRUD
  - Access Log Viewer
  - Report Generation UI
data:
  database: PostgreSQL
  storage:
  - User data
  - RFID card details
  - Access events
integrations:
- RFID Reader Hardware Interface
- Email/SMS Notification Service (for alerts)
observability:
- Centralized logging for system events and access attempts
- Application performance monitoring
- Health checks and uptime monitoring
security:
- Role-based access control for administrators
- Data encryption (in transit and at rest)
- Secure API endpoints with authentication

input.concept: AI-assisted knowledge base with semantic search and article feedback
input.requirements_yaml:
title: KnowloSync
description: Platform that centralizes support documentation, provides semantic search
  across articles, and collects user feedback for continuous improvement. Needs analytics
  for content managers.
functional_requirements:
- id: FR001
  description: Ingest markdown articles with metadata (tags, product area, release)
  priority: High
- id: FR002
  description: Offer semantic search with typo tolerance and synonym expansion
  priority: High
- id: FR003
  description: Allow users to rate helpfulness and submit feedback forms
  priority: Medium
- id: FR004
  description: Dashboard for content managers with top searches, gaps, feedback
  priority: Medium
non_functional_requirements:
- id: NFR001
  description: Search API <400ms p95 for 50 concurrent queries
  priority: High
- id: NFR002
  description: Content versioning with rollback support
  priority: Medium
- id: NFR003
  description: SOC2 Type II compliance and SSO (SAML/OIDC)
  priority: High
constraints:
- id: C001
  description: Must deploy on existing Kubernetes cluster
  priority: Medium
- id: C002
  description: All content stored in EU data centers
  priority: High
input.product_vision:
product_name: KnowloSync
product_summary: KnowloSync is an AI-assisted knowledge base platform designed to
  centralize support documentation, provide advanced semantic search capabilities,
  and facilitate continuous improvement through user feedback and content analytics
  for managers. It aims to empower users with self-service and enhance content quality.
target_users:
- End-users seeking information and self-service solutions
- Content Managers responsible for creating, maintaining, and improving documentation
- Support Teams leveraging the knowledge base to assist customers
value_proposition:
- Efficiently centralize and discover critical support documentation
- Improve content quality and relevance through continuous user feedback and analytical
  insights
- Reduce support ticket volume by empowering users with effective self-service
key_capabilities:
- Semantic search and discovery across centralized documentation
- User feedback collection, analysis, and content rating
- Content management with ingestion, metadata tagging, and versioning
- Analytics dashboard for content performance, search trends, and identified gaps
non_goals:
- Direct customer support ticketing system
- General-purpose content management system (CMS) for non-support content
- Real-time chat support integration
- Automated AI content generation
success_metrics:
- Reduction in support ticket volume
- Increase in successful self-service resolutions
- High user satisfaction with search results and content helpfulness
- Improved content freshness and relevance based on feedback cycles
last_updated: 2023-10-27 10:00:00+00:00

- External logging and monitoring services
observability:
- Centralized logging and metrics collection
- Application Performance Monitoring (APM)
- Alerting for critical system events
security:
- SSO integration for authentication
- Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
- Data encryption at rest and in transit

input.concept: Smart task management platform for distributed teams
input.requirements_yaml:
title: TaskFlow Nexus
description: A collaborative web application that centralizes task intake, prioritization
  and monitoring for distributed teams. It must support granular priorities, real-time
  status changes and rich analytics for leadership.
functional_requirements:
- id: FR001
  description: 'Create, edit and delete tasks with fields: title, description, priority,
    status, due_date'
  priority: High
- id: FR002
  description: Assign tasks to team members and track ownership changes
  priority: High
- id: FR003
  description: Generate dashboards with status, priority and due date filters
  priority: Medium
- id: FR004
  description: Send notifications when priority or status changes
  priority: High
non_functional_requirements:
- id: NFR001
  description: Support 500 concurrent users with sub-second list loading
  priority: High
- id: NFR002
  description: WCAG AA accessibility and full keyboard navigation
  priority: Medium
- id: NFR003
  description: Encrypt data at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.2)
  priority: High
constraints:
- id: C001
  description: Must integrate with Google Calendar and Slack
  priority: Medium
- id: C002
  description: Deployment limited to EU region for GDPR compliance
  priority: High
input.product_vision:
product_name: TaskFlow Nexus
product_summary: A collaborative web application designed to centralize task intake,
  prioritization, and monitoring for distributed teams. It aims to provide real-time
  status updates and rich analytics, fostering enhanced team coordination and data-driven
  leadership decision-making.
target_users:
- Distributed Teams
- Team Members
- Project Managers
- Team Leaders
- Executive Leadership
value_proposition:
- Streamlined task management and prioritization across distributed teams.
- Improved transparency and accountability through real-time monitoring.
- Data-driven insights for effective resource allocation and project oversight.
- Enhanced collaboration and communication within the team.
key_capabilities:
- Comprehensive Task Management (create, edit, delete, assign, track ownership, set
  priority, status, due date)
- Real-time Status Updates and Notifications for key changes
- Customizable Dashboards and Analytics for monitoring team progress and performance
- Integration with external tools (e.g., Google Calendar, Slack)
- Robust Data Security (encryption at rest and in transit)
- Accessibility (WCAG AA) and full keyboard navigation
non_goals:
- Complex project planning features (e.g., Gantt charts, detailed resource leveling
  beyond task assignment)
- Serving as a primary communication platform (relies on integrations for this)
- Global deployment beyond specified regions (initially EU only)
- Offline mode support
success_metrics:
- Increase in task completion rate by X%
- Achieve Y% user adoption within Z months
- Maintain sub-second load times for critical views
- Positive feedback from leadership on analytics utility
- Full compliance with WCAG AA and GDPR requirements
last_updated: 2023-10-27 10:30:00+00:00
